website_summaries.verdict: Taking the best from the classic Keds athletic footwear and adding a bit of height on its trademark vintage-looking rubber sole, the brand showcases the Keds Triple Kick Leather. This perfectly sized sneaker offers style and comfort in a simple platform makeup.The soft and luxe leather covering grants wearers the freedom to pair this shoe with a string of casual outfit. It’s simply a practical choice for those who need a minimalist, multifunction sneaker for light-bearing, year-round use.
pros: Keds Triple Kick Leather lasted for a long time, several buyers mentioned
Its leather cover is easy to clean
Lots of reviewers were blown away with its cushy insole
The soft fabric lining gives the feet a plush feel, noted by many users
A highly recommended platform sneaker as it is brimming with comfy rewards
Many attested that this shoe feels true to width
A lot mentioned that the length of this shoe is appropriate to size
Several users declared it is worth recommending to friends as it is reasonably priced
Several buyers described this as “very cute” and “stylish” which they can easily match with a variety of pants, shorts, and dresses
It has a moderate amount of arch support, one reviewer stated
A very satisfied user said this sneaker is appropriate for long walks such as all-day shopping as she didn’t experience any foot aches at all
cons: Few buyers noted that the shoelaces run short
The rear side of the cushioned insole carves into the heel, one reviewer noted

customer_reviews.title: Great for arthritic knees & back!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes so much I bought another pair before they stop making them. These are hard to find so buy a pair cuz you can always return them. I’m short so 2 extra inches on a memory foam cloud like interior, is amazing. I have arthritis & metal knees and these are the best walking shoes I’ve found in years.
customer_reviews.author: A.T. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: I always have trouble fitting cute little sneakers to my feet because my feet are not only narrow but my heels are narrower than usual, so to help accommodate I am delegated to lace up sneakers, with that said, these fit for comfort all around, and I was certainly not expecting to simply wear a little ped, but some extra thick socks to help pick up the slack in the shoe. Glad to report none of that. Love this sneaker, it is unusual that I can find something basic that fits my feet so well, as I said, I have narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Mae

customer_reviews.title: all day every day
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes they are chunky enough to be stylish but still age appropriate for a woman in her 40s who wants to keep up with fashion trends
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Says Ortholite insoles, but they're Dream Foam :(
customer_reviews.text: I specifically ordered the Keds Triple Kick in white leather BECAUSE THE DESCRIPTION SAID ORTHOLITE INSOLES! I have previously ordered the exact same shoes from Kohl's, and they were Ortholite. As you can see in the 3rd picture. The Ortholite insoles are the reason I want these shoes. But, the shoes I received were Dream Foam insoles. It's a tremendous difference, if what you're looking for is the support and shock reduction. I'm extremely dissatisfied. I was going to buy the black leather, also. But, after having them misrepresent the shoe, I will not be. It's a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Sunie Dae

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled with these Keds. Went by the Reviews. I have a narrow foot. They fit perfect. Just like Keds are supposed to fit and are very comfortable. Why is it so hard to find the more narrow shoes at Amazon. There are some of us who need the narrow. I still try and thankfully you are always gracious when I have to return. It's worth being "Prime Member".
customer_reviews.author: Linda by

customer_reviews.title: Cute, true size but narrow
customer_reviews.text: PROs: Good quality leather shoe with a nice platform feel. CONs: Slightly narrow, and for some reason the strings that come in them are way too short. Overall a good example of Keds
customer_reviews.author: Julianna R Marketer

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and not too high. Hard to decide between these and the cole Haan sneakers. These had a little less support so returned. They are also better cities for slimmer feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They're nice and comfortable. The soles feel cushiony. Think those looking for a wide fit might find these tight though. A bit expensive though for keds but overall because they are comfortable, happy w the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Naya

customer_reviews.title: Five Star White Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Product came exactly as expected. Beautiful all white leather sneakers are just what I was looking for. I wanted sneakers for spring/summer that can be worn with anything and these are it! I normally wear a 5.5 and a 6 (depending on fit) so I wasn't sure which size to get. I don't have wide feet so I decided to go with the smaller size and got a 5.5. They fit perfectly! No issues at all!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a platform white sneaker to wear with casual outfits and these are exactly what I was looking for. Price is a little steep but well worth it. Super comfy and true to size. Love they are leather so dirt can easily wipe away.
customer_reviews.author: GennaG

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: These were the 5th pair of white leather sneakers I tried and finally loved. Super comfy, awesome platform and cool looking. It’s such a great summer look. The only issue is that they run large. I usually a 7.5/8 but I had to go down to a 7 in these. I have slender feet, the width is good.
customer_reviews.author: cocora

customer_reviews.title: Tight and stiff
customer_reviews.text: What on earth happened to the reliable well fitting Keds I loved. There’s are advertised as canvas but they have been coated to keep them clean, I presume. I have boots that are softer. These hurt at stitching joints and felt clunky. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby’s Girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect with a summer dress or shorts
customer_reviews.text: Great sneakers! Sooo cute! The platform makes they perfect for a summer dress or skirt. So comfortable wore all day right out of the box. So happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: b schwartz

customer_reviews.title: My new, casual work shoes
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 8.5 Black Leather: I’m wondering if I should’ve gone with an 8? Idk but they fit Ok. I recommend tying the laces tightly so the shoes fit better bc I kinda lost my balance a few times.
customer_reviews.author: The Best Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. The caveat is that I have long, narrow feet and it is usually difficult to find sneakers that are narrow enough for a good fit. Even though they are narrow, the toe box is spacious enough for my comfort. Another pleasant surprise were the short shoelaces. No double tying and constant redoing of laces that are too long.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jackson

customer_reviews.title: DREAM FOAM
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize it when I bought them but they have foam soles and thats why these are my new favorite shoes. I’ve never worn a more comfortable pair of sneaks.
customer_reviews.author: V D

customer_reviews.title: They don't fit like they used to.
customer_reviews.text: They are a nice shoe if you wear a narrow width. It is not a medium width as advertised. I have a pair I bought a few years ago and the new ones were a full 1/2 inch narrower in width.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Buttigieg

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and confortable!
customer_reviews.text: I am totally and completely in love with these shoes! They are super comfortable and go well with everything !! I am delighted with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Witchy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow but otherwise great shoe. I can wear with thin socks. Super cute!
customer_reviews.author: RocCed

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute! Classic shoe
customer_reviews.text: Super stylish and classic while being really comfortable. Love them! A change from converse all the time. Mix it up!
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: For my preference the sole is too thick..other wise a great sport shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Sole was as shown, but once I saw it I could not wear with semi dress pants.
customer_reviews.author: LBEE

customer_reviews.title: Runs narrow and small.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe runs narrow and slightly smaller then what I typically get with size 9. But I really like them, very comfortable and great for spring.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Marlow

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Those are very comfortable shoes and they fit fine as medium width. My only issue is the laces that are too short
customer_reviews.author: jeanfor

customer_reviews.title: Really Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute shoe that gets more comfy after a couple of times of wearing. Only ding is that the heel slips a little - but that’s common with a lower cut in the back.
customer_reviews.author: CoastGuardLady

customer_reviews.title: So nice and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and exactly what I had hoped for! Seem well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Very confortable, no blister in the first use, that's amaizing, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Araya

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for my wife feet
customer_reviews.text: I have wide foot so this shoe fit me perfect. I did have to get longer shoe strings.....
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: love my Keds!
customer_reviews.text: I live sneakers, I've been wearing keds as a teenager, Im no longer a teen ager and that's what so great about Keds, you can be 5 or 65,:) I love how the look, how they fit and how they feel on my feet! Love my Keds! I purchased the Triple Kick Leather Keds, and i also have them in pink Satin!
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Anne B.

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Keds are the most comfortable sneaker for me...much more support and comfort than Converse...
customer_reviews.author: Ellyn V.

customer_reviews.title: Used ?
customer_reviews.text: My shoes weren’t in a shoebox, were dusty, and hadwhit fuzz balls on the black laces.
customer_reviews.author: jcj

customer_reviews.title: That they are so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes they are very cute and so comfortable. I am on my feet on cement floors all day at work and it's hard to find a comfortable pair of shoes, but I am very happy with these. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: KED is a great shoe. Amazing fit. I wear my shoes every day.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Great look with awesome style!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look & how comfortable the sneaker is! Wore them with a casual cotton summer dress to work, in retail, & got many compliments! My feet were quite happy after standing in these Keds for 7 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers, although a bit narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Even though they are a little narrow I like them very much and they are becoming more comfortable with each day of use.
customer_reviews.author: Renata Padilla Sol

customer_reviews.title: Butter soft leather
customer_reviews.text: I love them so much I already ordered another pair. They are lightweight and the leather is butter soft.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Reed

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: Totally deformed shoe with one shoe much more narrow than the other so one foot doesn’t fit! And I missed the return window! Ugh! What a waste!
customer_reviews.author: DE

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: These aren't bad, the width is very narrow.. I've rolled my ankle a few times but they're sturdy and well made otherwise. Just not optimal comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon B.

customer_reviews.title: The 5 1/2 fits perfectly! Classic stylish!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit to the T. Wore them all day and my feet were perfect. They are so cute with jeans and leggings! I rate them a 10 got the leather so they look classic.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa havlik

customer_reviews.title: Found the perfect shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They fit perfectly...not to narrow or wide! I wear a 6 1/2 and ordered a 6 1/2 and they fit true to size! Very cute and stylish..can wear with all outfits!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable and I have received a lot of compliments on them!
customer_reviews.author: Kirby Michelle Weaver

customer_reviews.title: I didn't find these to be too narrow. Maybe ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't find these to be too narrow. Maybe the shoelaces are a little short which is throwing people off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and look great with shorts
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair!! Comfy and look great with shorts, jeans, skirts!
customer_reviews.author: mookie

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable Sneaker Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am an 8.5 I ordered my size and it fit perfectly, I love the material but most of all the comfort of the shoe itself I absolutely loved these sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: NF512

customer_reviews.title: These did not disappoint me. they fit great and they are super ...
customer_reviews.text: I have always bought Keds. These did not disappoint me. they fit great and they are super cute.
customer_reviews.author: cah62

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like that I get compliments on my shoes but don’t find anyone else wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Cole

customer_reviews.title: Besides shoes being a little small, it wasn't the ...
customer_reviews.text: Besides shoes being a little small, it wasn't the right shoe I ordered. But on the box it did show the one I wanted. They DIDN'T LOOK inside the box to check to see if it was shoes.
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Run big
customer_reviews.text: Love these a classic updated but unfortunately had to return. Return process seems slow though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Love these, fit perfect !! Look great with skinnies or shorts.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Mowen

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet
customer_reviews.text: Love that they are leather and not made of plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Super comfy and exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Hover

customer_reviews.title: They run big
customer_reviews.text: I love the soft leather and chunky sole. They run big, I’m normally sz 9 but I’ve worn Keds in the past and knew I would need an 8.5
customer_reviews.author: Christine Bonacci

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my KEDS! They did not disappoint. They look good AND they feel good!
customer_reviews.author: Terri S.

customer_reviews.title: This keds are the best, love them
customer_reviews.text: This keds are the best, love them, If you are looking for a pair of walking shoes, these are the right ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kamalava

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: l love these shoes. Exactly what I wanted and expected.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Dawson

customer_reviews.title: BOMB
customer_reviews.text: I like the simplicity of the shoe, as well as the platform heel.
customer_reviews.author: JKai

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are even more comfortable than I expected. Dream Foam is appropriately named.
customer_reviews.author: Julie W.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but they are NOT leather! They are canvas ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute but they are NOT leather! They are canvas. Too much money for Canvas sneakers in my opinion. I returned them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Keds Women's Triple Kick Leather Sneaker
product_meta.description: A cushiony platform sneaker with edge and endless styling options. The Triple Kick platform sneaker is our elevated take on the tennis shoe, combining the lift of a heel with the comfort of a sneaker in one sporty-chic package. Perfect with every jean in your closet and an unexpected twist with dresses and skirts, it’s sure to become a starring role in your go-to rotation.
feature_bullets: Leather upper; 1-inch platform for added height; Lace to toe sneaker with 6 silver eyelets; Flat cotton tonal lace; Soft breathable twill lining; Dream Foam footbed; Flexible, textured rubber outsole; Care instructions: spot wash, air dry only;
